name: GMS CRISIS CATALOG
author: Butch Lesbian Marshadow(Maria) + Spen
description:
EMERGENCY ALERT DETECTED. PLEASE INPUT CREDENTIALS...
--[UN-CO-YVES-0979618323-2C]
CREDENTIALS ACKNOWLEDGED. WELCOME, COMMANDER. PLEASE INPUT YOUR COMMAND.
--[OPEN-ACCESS DISTRIBUTE WAR CATALOGUE-CODE ARM THE MASSES.]
PLEASE INPUT COMMAND VERIFICATION ID
--H-CRISIS-1553MND
ID RECOGNIZED. EMERGENCY PLANETARY CRISIS CONFLICT IN PROGRESS. STAY SAFE, COMMANDER.
````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````
"The world is in crisis, and war is already afoot. All capable pilot, soldiers, and militia are granted the full access of the current issue of modern  mainline GMS military equipment from any schedule printer. Please coordinate with the highest ranking official in your local military or security situation and verify with the war council. The enemy arrives in 72 hours."
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a catalogue for adding a few more options to the base GMS catalogue, to cover interesting niches or holes without crowing out the actual main licenses.  This includes a new Support frame, the DENALI, as well as heavy and auxiliary weapons for types that yet to exist, additional new main weapons for increased versatility, a new Superheavy launcher and melee weapon, a new grenade and mine, tech, and shield system for those burgeoning young controllers and supports.
